title: Buying champions problem
body: I have 6420 ip and I want to buy rengar for 6300 ip but it wont allow me cause it said *not enough rp/ip* and same as the other champion beside 4800 ip and lower

replies.body: Same issue. Can't unlock Camille for 7800 IP, despite having 7846 IP. GG

This is a fairly rare issue that some players experience on the New Client. If you swap back to the *Legacy Client*, you should be able to complete your purchase with no further issues. You can access the Legacy Client at any time from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^

Commenting on this because I have the same problem. Thought it was a client refresh issue so I bought the 1 IP icon for allstars. Still says I have enough IP but relevant priced champions are greyed out
